about_the_game:
This pack includes:

  • Object 140 (Rank 6, USSR)

  • Premium account for 15 days

  • 2000 Golden Eagles

The Object 140 is an experimental medium tank developed in the 1950s by the design bureau of Plant No.183.

While sharing many visual similarities to contemporary Soviet tanks, the Object 140 has a lot to offer. It features similar armor and mobility to the T-62, but with a powerful unique cannon. The long-barreled 100 mm gun lets you fire APHE rounds that can punch through just under 300 mm of armor! On top of this is a versatile selection of APDS, HE, and HEAT-FS rounds, giving you a powerful shell for every situation. The Object 140 also comes with a 14.5 mm KPVT machine gun, great for shredding lightly armored vehicles and taking down low-flying aircraft. It's also fitted with night vision devices and a rangefinder to keep your shells accurate over long distances.

A unique and powerful medium tank, the Object 140 is highly versatile and effective, boasting impressive armor, mobility, and especially firepower.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same vehicle or you already have the vehicle from this pack!

  • Available for Linux, Windows and Mac only. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account.
detailed_description:
Note!

This product cannot be purchased for PlayStation® or Xbox accounts!

This DLC will only be granted to the Steam account that was used to make the purchase. If you have some issues, please contact our support (login on the website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

This pack includes:

  • Object 140 (Rank 6, USSR)

  • Premium account for 15 days

  • 2000 Golden Eagles

The Object 140 is an experimental medium tank developed in the 1950s by the design bureau of Plant No.183.

While sharing many visual similarities to contemporary Soviet tanks, the Object 140 has a lot to offer. It features similar armor and mobility to the T-62, but with a powerful unique cannon. The long-barreled 100 mm gun lets you fire APHE rounds that can punch through just under 300 mm of armor! On top of this is a versatile selection of APDS, HE, and HEAT-FS rounds, giving you a powerful shell for every situation. The Object 140 also comes with a 14.5 mm KPVT machine gun, great for shredding lightly armored vehicles and taking down low-flying aircraft. It's also fitted with night vision devices and a rangefinder to keep your shells accurate over long distances.

A unique and powerful medium tank, the Object 140 is highly versatile and effective, boasting impressive armor, mobility, and especially firepower.

name: War Thunder - Object 140 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor:2,2 GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 6XXX series or higher; AMD Radeon 1XXX series or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia GeForce 460 or higher
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 MB HD space
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
